Interface com.chimu.form.database.Column

public interface Column
A Column is either a Basic (real) or Compound (virtual) column on a database table. Either way a column represents the information about a table and the rows from that table.

Column is the "Component" in a Composite Pattern with CompoundColumn as the Composite and BasicColumn as the Leaf. As the root abstract type it supports the protocol common to BasicColumn and CompoundColumn, and any functionality that seems best to push upward and generalize between the two component types.

See Also:
BasicColumn, CompoundColumn
